version_description:
• Support for the MV88+ digital stereo condenser microphone
• Bug fixes

• Custom Presets: Save and reuse your favorite mic settings 
• Bug fixes and other performance improvements to reduce crashes and errors when saving

• Start and stop recordings with Apple Watch
• Full screen support for phones with notch
• Bug fixes

We are constantly working to improve our app to give you a better experience. Every update contains bug fixes and general enhancements.

Thank you for using ShurePlus MOTIV Video! Your feedback is important to us and will help to improve our app in the future – leave us a review or send us feedback in the app.
